title: Nicolás Serignese
description: Besides leading people and projects for the last +7 years, my technical expertise lies in Digital Transformation, RPA and Data Analytics. My focus is on helping our clients achieve their objectives through technology. My hobbies include music, sports, films, traveling, and spending time with family and friends.

title: Tomás Mongelós
description: As a curious person, I have learned both frontend and backend programming. I also invest time in exploring UX/UI design, as it is a key factor for success in our projects. My hobbies include spending time with family, hanging out with friends, participating in sports, and watching films.
